result.arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ
result.translation: (4) And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book[1430] with Us, exalted and full of wisdom.[1431]
result.footnotes:
[1430]- i.e., the Preserved Slate (al-Lawḥ al-Maḥfūẓ).
[1431]- Also, "precise" or "specific."
